scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm exec lerna run test
scripts./// about bootstrap: Installs all packages dependencies and links any cross-dependencies.
scripts./// about add-changeset: Will ask you about changes, and create changeset files for desired packages
scripts./// about release: Releases packages to npm, intended to be run by continous delivery github workflow action
There is a possible race issue with this command due to changesets running all releases in parallel rather than topologically
This means there is a possibility that the drah-shared types are not available in time for the client and server builds
As a workaround, we don't clear the build folder on prepare, assuming it is running in ci. And then run the prepare via lerna pre publish
scripts.release: npm exec lerna run prepare && npm exec changeset publish
